remarks: The difference of two group sums expressed as mappings.  (Contributed by AV, 7-Nov-2019.)
statement:
gsummptfssub.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
gsummptfssub.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
gsummptfssub.s $e |- .- = ( -g ` G ) $.
gsummptfssub.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. Abel ) $.
gsummptfssub.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
gsummptfssub.c $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> C e. B ) $.
gsummptfssub.d $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> D e. B ) $.
gsummptfssub.f $e |- ( ph -> F = ( x e. A |-> C ) ) $.
gsummptfssub.h $e |- ( ph -> H = ( x e. A |-> D ) ) $.
gsummptfssub.w $e |- ( ph -> F finSupp .0. ) $.
gsummptfssub.v $e |- ( ph -> H finSupp .0. ) $.
gsummptfssub $p |- ( ph -> ( G gsum ( x e. A |-> ( C .- D ) ) ) = ( ( G gsum F ) .- ( G gsum H ) ) ) $.
$d .- x $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d ph x $.
